dashboard.title: FinOps Cost Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time cost monitoring and optimization tracking

targets.query: SELECT date, current_monthly_cost_usd, projected_monthly_cost_usd FROM cost_analyses ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT potential_savings_usd FROM cost_analyses ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT (current_monthly_cost_usd / (current_monthly_cost_usd + potential_savings_usd)) * 100 as efficiency FROM cost_analyses ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT metrics->>'db_size_gb' as db_size, metrics->>'db_connections' as connections FROM cost_analyses ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT metrics->>'function_invocations' as invocations FROM cost_analyses ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT jsonb_array_elements(recommendations)->>'category' as category, COUNT(*) FROM cost_analyses WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY category
SELECT jsonb_array_elements(recommendations)->>'severity' as severity, COUNT(*) FROM cost_analyses WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY severity

SELECT rec->>'title' as title, rec->>'estimated_savings_usd_monthly' as savings, rec->>'effort' as effort FROM cost_analyses, jsonb_array_elements(recommendations) as rec WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY (rec->>'estimated_savings_usd_monthly')::numeric DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT timestamp, jsonb_array_elements(recommendations)->>'category' as category, SUM((jsonb_array_elements(recommendations)->>'estimated_savings_usd_monthly')::numeric) as potential_savings FROM cost_analyses WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY timestamp, category
SELECT timestamp, metrics->>'bandwidth_gb' as bandwidth FROM cost_analyses WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
